messages.content:
Using A-Frame display a scene showing the model loaded from "https://api.syte.ms/api/3d/gltf/DENW49AL00009XTV". This API is going to return a gltf file which you can load into the scene after it downloads.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

The scene is a white page and there is no console error. Just add a blue sky and a plane surface, place the building on it and make camera movements and asdw movements possible
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
